title: FCOMI/FCOMIP/FUCOMI/FUCOMIP — Compare Floating Point Values and Set EFLAGS

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`FCOMI ST, ST(i)`
`FCOMIP ST, ST(i)`
`FUCOMI ST, ST(i)`
`FUCOMIP ST, ST(i)`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Performs an unordered comparison of the contents of registers ST(0) and ST(i) and sets the status flags ZF, PF, and CF in the EFLAGS register according to the results (see the table below). The sign of zero is ignored for comparisons, so that –0.0 is equal to +0.0.

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
